CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(Type__c), 'Email', 'eeeeemail', 'Slack', CASE( TEXT(SlackConnectionType__c), 'Named Credential', SlackChannel__c + ' (' + SlackNamedCredential__c + ' Named Credential)', 'Webhook', 'Webhook ' + SlackWebhookUrl__c, 'Unknown' ), 'Unknown' )
CustomField.label: Recipient
